mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.alarm_genDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as alarm_genDate, a.alarm_id, a.alarm_idfNum, a.alarm_msg, a.alarm_readCheck, a.alarm_type, ( SELECT photo_fileName FROM photo WHERE photo_type = 4 AND photo_idfNum = p.pro_idx ORDER BY photo_id ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS photo_fileName, m.member_nickName FROM alarm a JOIN pro p ON a.pro_recvIdx = p.pro_idx JOIN member m ON p.member_idx = m.member_idx WHERE p.member_idx = #{param1} ORDER BY a.alarm_genDate DESC
